aprilFoolProfile.NA:

A mischievous duchess from a cold and frigid nation. She attacks using a familiar that manipulates ice. While she may look frail, she is actually quite sturdy. You may be able to capture her if you set up a kotatsu.

aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Beast-Type Servant

Atalante has been through some...stuff. Some stuff that turned her into a feral beast. Yeah, she's scantily dressed, but she's totally serious. She has a soft spot for children. Don't...don't let her get near Jeanne.

せんせいサーヴァント
ロボット軍団を操る仮面の博士。最強の巨大ロボを作り出すのが夢。柔和な物腰だが目的のためなら多少の犠牲は厭わないサイコパスな一面もあるぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:

Music-Type Servant

Even though he worked hard to become a court musician, his love and envy of Amadeus drove him a little crazy. He loves sweets, though.

極寒の地で生き抜くためにムキムキになった地上最大の皇帝。いつも不機嫌そうだが眠っているときは幸せそうな顔をしている。象の扱いがうまい。

皇帝从者
为了在极寒之地生存而变得十分壮硕的地表最巨大皇帝。

很擅长操控大象。

Emperor-Type Servant
 
The largest tsar in the world. He bulked up to survive his world's harsh cold. Sure, he generally looks like a scary grump, but he still manages to look peaceful while he's asleep. Pretty good with elephants, too.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ヤンキーサーヴァント
誰もが知ってる超有名なスーパーヒーロー。チャリでやって来たが、自分の足で走る方がはるかに速いという駿足の持ち主。かかとが敏感。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
混混从者
人尽皆知的超有名超级英雄。
虽是乘着战车来的，但其实是自己跑起来更快的飞毛腿。
脚后跟很敏感。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Delinquent-Type Servant

A great and truly famous superhero. He came by bicycle, but he's actually faster on foot. Has sensitive heels.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
うまサーヴァント
数々の有名選手を育ててきた体育の先生。すきあらば授業を始めようとする。本来は下半身が馬のように立派らしいのだが、さすがにまずいので隠しているぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
马从者
培养了众多著名选手的体育老师。
一有机会就会开始上课。
原本下半身像马那样健壮，但毕竟不太妥当，所以藏起来了。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Horse-Type Servant

A PE teacher who's coached numerous famous athletes. Tries to hold class whenever given half a chance. His bottom half is actually a majestic horse, but he hides it because it's a little extra most of the time.

0:
A great sage of Greek myth.

He was extremely well-versed in many disciplines. His gentle personality and skillful teaching methodology made him mentor to countless Greek heroes.

Heracles, Achilles, Jason, Asclepius, and Castor...

Each may be from different ages, but all were students of Chiron.
1:
Height/Weight: 179cm, 81kg

Origin: Greek Mythology

Region: Greece

Alignment: Lawful-Good

Gender: Male

He was the child of Cronus, Zeus's father, and the island goddess Philyra.
2:
The Titan Cronus took the form of a horse and lay with Philyra, who gave birth to Chiron, a half-man, half-equine centaur. Philyra was disgusted by her son's monstrous form and refused to nurse him, and was transformed into a linden tree.


Though he never had his parents' love, Chiron became a great sage, mastering many academic disciplines. That his mother, Philyra, and the linden tree share a name in Greek is no coincidence, as linden tree flowers are used as a stimulant, and its bark is often used for fortune-telling and signboards.


At the request of many throughout Greece, the adult Chiron took on the job of educating and training future heroes. Among those he educated were the great heroes Heracles and Achilles, Asclepius the god of medicine, as well as Castor, who later became the constellation Gemini. Jason, the leader of the Argonauts, also trained under Chiron.


Though, according to Jason, "When you get to be as awesome as me, such simple lessons are like nails on a chalkboard! I would've preferred to be taught how to deal with annoying women whenever I stumble across them!"
3:
Eternal Dedication: EX

A skill derived from the legend in which Chiron became the constellation Sagittarius after offering up his immortality. By transforming into a collection of stars, he becomes the one who protects people from the scorpion of the heavens.


Wisdom of Divine Gift: A+

Various wisdom bestowed upon the sage by the Greek gods.

Other than special skills exclusive to other heroes, he is able to use almost any skill at an A-B proficiency level. So long as he has his Master's permission, this skill may be granted to other Servants. During a different Holy Grail War, he would only be able to use this skill on himself, but he is ready and eager to use it for Chaldea now!
4:
『Antares Snipe』

Rank: A

NP Type: Anti-Personnel

Range: 5-99

Maximum Targets: 1


A Single Shot at the Celestial Scorpion.

A manifestation of the story of Chiron as Sagittarius poised to attack the scorpion in the heavens. This Noble Phantasm, the ultimate shot for which all bowmen eternally strive, can pierce even a star. This shot can be used the moment its True Name is revealed, and it is no mere arrow, but a shooting star that streaks across the sky.

Even Achilles, known to be a fast runner, could not evade this Noble Phantasm.

The sole drawback is that it can be used only once each night. However, if it's used correctly at the right time, it is certain to hit its mark.
5: Chiron, one of the prominent great sages of Greek myth, was hit by an arrow coated in a hydra's venom. In order to escape from the pain, Chiron surrendered his immortality, which was the sole proof of his godly status. The Greek gods were saddened by Chiron's death and raised him up to the heavens to became a constellation. However, the Chiron summoned here regrets that he gave up his immortality, and wishes to regain it. He desires this not to become a god once again, nor because he wishes to live forever, but rather to reclaim the one thing he inherited from his parents.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:

ひときりサーヴァント

Spirit of Restoration-Type Servant

aprilFoolProfile.CN:
皇帝从者

aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Emperor-Type Servant

aprilFoolProfile.CN:
眼镜从者
幻之从者之一。

aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Glasses-Type Servant

One of the Mythical Servants. The glasses make him look intelligent. He and Brynhildr are a loving husband and wife, but if you pair them up, she might kill him.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
いくさおとめサーヴァント

aprilFoolProfile.CN:

aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Battle Maiden-Type Servant

aprilFoolProfile.JP:

aprilFoolProfile.CN:

aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Queen-Type Servant

aprilFoolProfile.JP:

aprilFoolProfile.CN:

aprilFoolProfile.NA:

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
うまサーヴァント
数多くの凶悪兵装を搭載した四足歩行型戦車。高性能ＡＩに制御され敵の二手三手先を読んで自律行動する。実戦配備されれば世界の核バランスに重大な影響をおよぼすだろう。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
马从者
搭载了众多凶恶兵器的四足行走型战车。
在高性能AI的控制下，能自律行动预测敌人接下来的两三步行动。
一旦被用作实战配备，应该会对世界核平衡造成重大影响吧。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Horse-Type Servant

A walking tank with scary artillery. He acts autonomously, controlled by an extremely smart AI that analyzes the enemy's next moves. He might well change the balance of the world's power should he be utilized in real world battles.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
びだんしサーヴァント
イケメンで有名なイケメンサーヴァント。仮面は制御不能なイケメンを抑えるための拘束具。外せばもちろんイケメンビームが出る。馬の扱いがうまい。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
美男子从者
以帅著称的帅哥从者。
假面是对无法控制的帅气进行遏制的拘束道具。
只要脱下当然就会发射帅哥光炮。擅长驱使马。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Handsome-Type Servant

This handsome Servant is famous for his handsomeness. The mask works to suppress his unearthly handsomeness, and the moment it is taken off, he emits a handsome beam. So handsome. Also good with horses.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ぶしょうサーヴァント
がんばりやのおねえさんサーヴァント。まじめな優等生タイプ。同期が超絶変人ばかりなので苦労させられるばかりか影も薄くなりがちな不遇美少女だ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
武将从者
勤奋努力的大姐姐从者。认真的优等生类型。
可能是因为同期全是些超级怪人吧，不仅操劳辛苦，存在感还经常很弱的不得志美少女。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Military General-Type Servant

The sort of Servant who puts one in mind of an elder sister on the honor roll. She is an ill-fated beauty who often gets overshadowed by her coworkers, who are all just super weird and cause her all sorts of trouble.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
こうていサーヴァント
天下統一を成し遂げてしまった朕の国の皇帝。最初は無骨で動きが鈍そうな巨体だが最終形態はスリムな細マッチョという少年漫画でよくある変身系ラスボスだ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
皇帝从者
完成了天下统一的朕之国的皇帝。
起初拥有粗鲁而行动迟钝的巨大身躯，但最终形态苗条而具备瘦形肌肉，属于少年漫画常见的变身系最终BOSS。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Emperor-Type Servant

This emperor unified an entire nation, then named it after themself. They started out as a massive, ponderous giant but ultimately evolved into a slim, muscular body like you'd expect from a boss character in any shonen manga.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
きゅうけつサーヴァント
哀しき運命に翻弄された人間嫌いサーヴァント。存在自体が第２部３章のネタバレになっている。最愛の彼氏との再会を切望しているが……恒常だし、そのうち引けたらいいね。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
吸血从者
被悲哀的命运玩弄的厌恶人类的从者。
存在本身就是第2部第3章的剧透。
迫切期望与最爱的男友重逢……但对方毕竟是卡池常驻，但愿有将来能抽到。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Bloodsucker-Type Servant

A human-hating Servant who has long suffered because of her horrid fate. Her very existence is a spoiler for Arc 2 Chapter 3. She yearns to be reunited with her beloved one, but... Well, he's in the permanent pool, so I'm sure he'll show up eventually.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
うまサーヴァント
人馬一体の呂布から呂布成分を引いた状態の１００％馬サーヴァント。自分を呂布だと信じ込んでいる。本当のことを言ってあまり刺激しないようにしよう。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
马从者
从人马一体的吕布中分离了吕布成分状态的100％马从者。
坚信自己就是吕布。
还是不要说太多真话刺激到他比较好。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Horse-Type Servant

The Lu Bu element was completely extracted from his man-horse Servant, resulting in Lu Bu becoming 100% horse. He is absolutely convinced he's Lu Bu, though, so don't tell him otherwise. You'll trigger him.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
きしサーヴァント
タフだがちょっぴりドジな少女騎士。後ろ姿がチャームポイント。一途な恋心を胸に秘め、想い人を探し今日も戦う。マーリンの生き霊に取り憑かれている。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
骑士从者
顽强但有些冒失的少女从者。背影是魅力点。
心中藏着专情的爱意，为了寻找思念之人而战斗。
被梅林的生灵附身了。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Knight-Type Servant

A tough but slightly ditzy knight. Very prominent derriere. Constantly on a quest to find her one true love. Also, she's haunted by Merlin's living spirit.

mcLink: 魁札尔·科亚特尔〔桑巴／圣诞〕
aprilFoolAssets: https://fgo.wiki/images/d/d1/魁札尔·科亚特尔〔桑巴／圣诞〕愚人节卡面_FGL_1.png
https://fgo.wiki/images/6/63/魁札尔·科亚特尔〔桑巴／圣诞〕愚人节卡面_FGL_2.png

https://fgo.wiki/images/5/58/魁札尔·科亚特尔〔桑巴／圣诞〕愚人节卡面_FGL_5.png

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ルチャサーヴァント
クリスマスにちびっこたちを笑顔にするため覆面サンタと化したケツァル・コアトル。空から降り注ぐ夢いっぱいのプレセントにみんなニッコリだ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
摔角从者
为了在圣诞节给小孩子们带来笑容而假面圣诞老人化的魁札尔·科亚特尔。
从空中降下的充满了梦想的礼物让大家都露出了笑容。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Lucha-Type Servant

Quetzalcoatl transformed into a masked Servant to bring children everywhere joy on Christmas. Presents raining from the sky will totally make everyone smile.

mcSprites: Servant233战斗模型-灵衣-正派假面.png
Servant233战斗模型-灵衣-反派假面.png

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
すずめサーヴァント
民宿の若女将。昔話の舌切り雀が地獄で修行を積んだ結果、居合いの達人に成長したという。料理の達人だが、彼女から教えを乞うには相当な覚悟が必要だ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
麻雀从者
民俗的年轻老板娘。据说传说故事中的剪舌麻雀在地狱修行之后，成长为了居合高手。
虽是烹饪高手，但向她请教需要相当的觉悟。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Sparrow-Type Servant

The young proprietress of an inn. The tongue-cut sparrow from folklore underwent training in hell to become a master of sword-drawing. She's also a master chef...but you'll want to brace yourself if you plan on learning from her.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
けんぽうサーヴァント
年老いてなお元気いっぱいな拳法家のおじいさん。槍があってもなくてもヤバいという噂は本当だった。殺すだけでなく癒しのマッサージも得意だぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
拳法从者
老当益壮的拳法家爷爷。
无论有没有长枪都很难对付的传言货真价实。
不仅擅长杀戮，也很擅长治愈的按摩哦。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Kung Fu-Type Servant

A master of martial arts who is, despite his age, still pretty spry. Looks like the rumors about him being dangerous without a lance were true. He's both a killer of men and of back pain with outstanding massages!

aprilFoolAssets: https://fgo.wiki/images/c/c7/美游·艾德费尔特愚人节卡面_FGL_1.png
https://fgo.wiki/images/1/14/美游·艾德费尔特愚人节卡面_FGL_2.png
https://fgo.wiki/images/f/fb/美游·艾德费尔特愚人节卡面_FGL_3.png
https://fgo.wiki/images/d/da/美游·艾德费尔特愚人节卡面_FGL_4.png
https://fgo.wiki/images/3/3e/美游·艾德费尔特愚人节卡面_FGL_5.png

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
マジカルサーヴァント
やっと来てくれた第３の魔法少女。空は飛べない。可憐だがなにか重い設定を抱えてそうな影があるぞ。イリヤに対して行き過ぎた友情を感じているようだ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
魔法从者
总算到来的第3魔法少女。不会在空中飞翔。
虽然楚楚可怜，但似乎笼罩着某种沉重设定的阴影哦。
仿佛能感受到她对伊莉雅过度的友情。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Magical-Type Servant
 
The third magical girl is a little late to the party. Might have something to do with her aversion to flight. Seems like she's carrying a dark secret or something. Her feelings toward Illya are...maybe a little more than friendly.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
うたよみサーヴァント
カルデア図書館に住むふしぎな司書さん。本が大好きな夢みる文学少女。謎の力でついつい他人の本音を暴露してしまい人間関係に波紋を投げかけるぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
吟诗从者
居住在迦勒底图书馆的图书管理员小姐。
非常喜爱书籍的做梦文学少女。
她的某种谜之力量常会暴露他人的真心话，为人际关系投下了不安定的波纹哦。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Poetry Composition-Type Servant

A peculiar librarian who lives in Chaldea's library. She's a daydreaming bookworm. Her mysterious powers unintentionally expose other people's secret feelings, and that kind of messes up relationships.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ＡＩサーヴァント
なでなでされるのが大好きな子犬系美少女。ごはんをあげればどんどん大きく成長する、とても育てがいのある子。体育座りのままおしりを使って敏捷に動き回るぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
AI从者
最喜欢被摸头的幼犬系美少女。
只要给她喂饭，就会不断长大，非常有培养价值的孩子。
能在抱膝坐着的状态下用臀部敏捷地移动哦。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
AI-Type Servant

An adorable, not-so-little cutie who loves head pats. The more you feed her, the bigger she gets, which makes it all worthwhile. She is quite nimble for someone scooting around on her butt.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
めがみサーヴァント
後輩みのあるエッチな恋のキューピッド。男湯にも入れる。いろいろ大変なことがあったらしく、とてもやさぐれている。色恋の話題にはもううんざり。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
女神从者
很有后辈感的色情恋爱之丘比特。也能进男浴室。
好像经历过非常艰难的过去，极端自暴自弃。
受够了恋爱的话题。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Goddess-Type Servant

A sexy, kouhai-esque cupid. If the line to the restroom gets too long she can use her mythological origin as an excuse to go to the boy's restroom. She's been through some stuff, so she's really sulky, and is totally fed up of talking about love.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ぎりのいもうとサーヴァント
天使のような笑顔を持つ小悪魔サーヴァント。他人を陥れ苦しめることに無上の喜びを感じており、特に孔明は彼女のおもちゃにされている。でもかわいいから許せるぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
义妹从者
拥有天使般笑容的小恶魔从者。
能从坑害折磨他人中感受到无上的喜悦，尤其是孔明被她当做了玩具。
但毕竟很可爱，所以可以原谅哦。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Adoptive Sister-Type Servant

A Servant who hides her devilish intention behind her angelic smile. Making others suffer brings utmost joy to her, especially when she toys around Zhuge Liang.

But she's cute, so all's forgiven.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
にくだんサーヴァント
善悪を裁量し正義の裁きを下す美しきプロレスラー。力こそ正義、彼女が悪と決めたものは悪であり、悪い奴らは全員バックドロップの刑を免れない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
肉搏从者
裁量善恶，降下正义裁定的魅力摔角手。
力量就是正义，被她认定为恶的就是恶，邪恶的家伙全都逃不过背摔之刑。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Human Tank-Type Servant

The beautiful wrestler who embodies righteousness and passes judgement on the wicked. The strongs are just, so if she says you're evil then you must be evil, and the evil ones must be suplexed.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
はかもりサーヴァント
ちょっぴりシャイな女の子。孔明の舎弟。彼の命令ひとつで大鎌やらビームやら物騒な武器で襲いかかる。アルトリア系サーヴァントとよく間違えられるのが悩み。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
守墓人从者
稍微有些害羞的女孩子。孔明的跟班。
只要他一声令下，就会用巨大镰刀或是光炮等危险的武器发动攻击。
烦恼是经常被人与阿尔托莉雅系从者搞错。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Grave Keeper-Type Servant

Zhuge Liang's underling who's a tad bit shy.

If it's Zhuge's order, she will attack you with scary stuff like a giant scythe and laser beam. Being frequently mistaken as an Altria-Type Servant has been troubling her.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ひきこもりサーヴァント
大変ありがたい象の像。玄関や居間に飾っておけば家内安全、商売繁盛、学力向上まちがいなし。中に何か丸っこい生き物が住み着いているようだ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
家里蹲从者
非常尊贵的大象石像。
如果能装饰在玄关或是客厅，肯定就能保佑全家安全、生意兴隆，成绩优秀。
里面好像住着某种圆滚滚的生物。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Hikikomori-Type Servant

Be grateful when you put up this elephant statue, as it will bless your household with safety, fortune, and good grades just by placing it in your living room. However it seems there's a round and plumb lifeform living in there.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
プリンセスサーヴァント
お国の自由と独立のために反乱軍を率いて戦うお姫さま。よくない霊に取り憑かれているのかとても運が悪く、ケガが絶えない。ジャンヌの親戚ではない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
公主从者
为了国家的自由与独立，率领起义军战斗的公主殿下。
或许是被不好的灵附体了吧，运气很差，伤痕累累。
并不是贞德的亲戚。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Princess-Type Servant

A princess who fought for the freedom and independence of her nation. Her bad luck and constant injury makes you wonder if she's being haunted by something. She's not related to Jeanne.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
かりうどサーヴァント
頭の上のリンゴを矢で射抜いたことで今日まで語り継がれる国民的英雄。それ以外はよく分からない。具体的に何で生活している人なのだろうか。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
猎人从者
因为用箭射穿了顶在头上的苹果而被传颂至今的国民英雄。
除此以外一切不明。具体是过什么样生活的人啊。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Hunter-Type Servant

A national hero whose tale of shooting an apple off someone's head is still praised today. Not much is known about him though. I mean, what does he actually do for a living?

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
さじサーヴァント
アルジュナがやさぐれきったすがた。世界を壊してまた最初から始めるのが毎日の日課。すべてが些事でしかないが、カルナさんのことだけはまだ興味津々のようだ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
琐事从者
阿周那彻底自暴自弃后的样子。
每天的工作就是毁灭世界然后从头开始。
一切都是琐事，但似乎唯独对迦尔纳先生兴趣盎然。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Trivial-Type Servant

Arjuna after he sulks his way into this form. He spends his day destroying the world and starting it anew. Everything in the world is trivial to him, except it seems he's still interested in Karna.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
げきおこサーヴァント
チャクラムでブイブイいわせている不良のおにいさん。怒りこそが原動力ということでいつも怒っているらしいのだが、わりといつも機嫌がよさそうに見える。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
激怒从者
总是让环刃嗡嗡旋转的不良大哥。
由于愤怒才是原动力，所以一直在生气，但平时看上去心情还是不错的。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Rage-Type Servant

A delinquent who swings a chakram around. He claims rage empowers him so he's angry all the time. On the contrary, he actually seems to be in a good mood most of the time.

aprilFoolAssets: https://fgo.wiki/images/b/b3/阿斯克勒庇俄斯愚人节卡面_FGL_1.png
https://fgo.wiki/images/8/82/阿斯克勒庇俄斯愚人节卡面_FGL_2.png
https://fgo.wiki/images/f/f1/阿斯克勒庇俄斯愚人节卡面_FGL_3.png
https://fgo.wiki/images/a/a7/阿斯克勒庇俄斯愚人节卡面_FGL_4.png
https://fgo.wiki/images/6/62/阿斯克勒庇俄斯愚人节卡面_FGL_5.png

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
いしゃサーヴァント
たとえ死んでいても治癒する神の手を持った史上最強の覆面ドクター。他の名医の例にもれず大変愛想が悪い。言うことを聞かない患者が大きらい。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
治愈从者
拥有即便死去也能治愈的神之手的史上最强蒙面医生。
与其他名医一样，态度极为恶劣。非常讨厌不听话的患者。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Physician-Type Servant

The most powerful masked doctor who can bring you back from the dead with his divine healing hands. He's unfriendly just like any other famous doctor, and he despite patients who ignore his advice.

mcSprites: 阿斯克勒庇俄斯灵衣11模型.png

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
まおうサーヴァント
すべてのノッブがひとつになった究極のノッブ。霊基再臨のたびにノッブが変わる一粒で三度おいしいノッブ。最終再臨ノッブはかなりクールでシリアスなノッブだ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
魔王从者
所有信合为一体的终极信。
每次灵基再临时都会换一个信，一箭三雕的信。
最终再临信是相当冷酷而严肃的信。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Demon King-Type Servant

The ultimate Nobbu that combines all the Nobbus into one Nobbu. But wait, there's more! Each time you ascend this Nobbu you get a different Nobbu. Wow what a deal. The final ascended Nobbu is a cool and serious Nobbu.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
どきゅんサーヴァント
ちょっぴりやんちゃな暴れん坊。つねにメンチを切っており、目が合った相手はもれなく因縁をつけられ槍で突かれる。懐いたらけっこうかわいい。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
麻烦精从者
稍微有些顽皮的粗暴分子。
总是在瞪人，视线一对上就会找茬用枪指着对方。
关系亲密之后还挺可爱的。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Thug-Type Servant

A slightly rowdy delinquent. He stares people down all the time and if you make eye contact with him, he's gonna think you have a problem with him and stab you with his spear. Though he does get kinda cute when he opens up to you.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ぐんしんサーヴァント
戦国時代を代表する最強の武将。職場ではいつでもニコニコ笑顔を絶やさないが、つねにアルコールが入っているせいかもしれない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
军神从者
代表了战国时代的最强武将。
工作时一直笑眯眯的，可能是因为加了酒精吧。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
War God-Type Servant

The most powerful general during the Warring States era. Always smiling at work, but that could be just because she's drunk all the time.

aprilFoolAssets: https://fgo.wiki/images/f/fe/莱昂纳多·达·芬奇(Rider)愚人节卡面_FGL_1.png
https://fgo.wiki/images/8/8e/莱昂纳多·达·芬奇(Rider)愚人节卡面_FGL_2.png

0:
爱俄尔卡斯王埃宋之子，原本名叫狄俄墨德斯，但在被喀戎收养之后，被改名成了伊阿宋。
作为阿耳戈号的船长，经历了众多冒险。
1:
身高／体重：181cm·76kg
出处：希腊神话
地域：希腊
属性：秩序·善　　　性别：男性
「哎，我是Saber？　不是Lancer或是Rider吗？」
2:
伊阿宋要求父亲埃宋的异父弟弟珀利阿斯返还被他篡夺的王位，但对方要求伊阿宋交出金羊毛用来交换。
于是伊阿宋建造了一艘船，在全希腊召集冒险者。
船名为阿耳戈号，船员被人们称作阿耳戈英雄。
3:
赫拉克勒斯、凯妮斯、阿塔兰忒、卡斯托耳、波鲁克斯、俄耳甫斯等众多英雄汇集一堂的这艘船在经历了一场宏伟的冒险之后，伊阿宋成功夺取了金羊毛。然而当时，伊阿宋却笼络了美狄亚，并娶了她，娶她为妻。

……事情的经过无需详述。
嫉妒唤来了憎恨，憎恨唤来了复仇。
传说当伊阿宋所有的地位与名誉都遭到了剥夺，
正打算在阿耳戈号船首上吊的瞬间，
就被砸落的船首压死了。
4:
寻求的金羊毛：无
他在经历了冒险之后获得的长着金毛的羊皮。
其实还挺柔软的，摸起来很舒服。

虎口灵光闪现：A
当身陷绝境时，可通过舍身之类的行动逃脱困境。
作为危机中闪现的灵光而言，他的水准远非他人可及。
但是伊阿宋本人却非常厌恶这种能力。
因为每次都必须遭受濒死的危机时才会灵光乍现。

与友征战遥远航路：B++
能让曾经搭乘过阿耳戈号的船员勇气倍增。
没有搭乘过的人也会隐约有种鼓起了勇气的感觉。
可以说是一种范围超限定的亚种领袖气质。
5:
『撕裂天际的光辉之船』
阶级：B++　种类：对军宝具
有效范围：1～10　最大捕捉：50人

Astrapste Argo
阿耳戈号的救援。搭乘阿耳戈号的英雄们会一起发动攻击。
在战斗中伊阿宋所处的立场越是正确，船员们的赞同数也就越多，攻击次数也会越多。

反过来说，如果他所处的立场明显是反派，
就会陷入『令人震惊的是没有一个人愿意上船（消极怠工）』的状态，威力也会显著低下。

0:
The son of Aeson, the king of Iolcus. His given name was Diomedes, but when he was taken in by Chiron, his name was changed to Jason.


He went on many epic adventures as the captain of the Argo.
1:
Height/Weight: 181cm, 76kg

Origin: Greek Mythology

Region: Greece

Alignment: Lawful-Good

Gender: Male

"Huh? I'm a Saber? Not a Lancer or Rider?"
2:
Jason demanded that Pelias, his father's half-brother, return the throne to him as the rightful heir. Pelias agreed if the Golden Fleece was brought to him.

And so, Jason built a ship and recruited adventurers throughout Greece. The ship was called the Argo, and the crew were called the Argonauts.
3:
Heracles, Caenis, Atalante, Castor, Pollux, Orpheus, and other heroes assembled on board this ship, and after a great adventure, Jason managed to return with the fleece. However, along the way, he had also made Medea his wife. What a careless choice...


...The details of what happened will not be stated here. Jealousy brought forth hatred, and hatred summoned revenge.

Jason lost his position and fame, and as he tried to hang himself off the Argo, its bow fell and crushed him instead.
4:
The Desired Argon Coin: None

The golden sheep's fleece that Jason obtained from his adventure. It's fluffy and has a pleasant texture.


Inspiration at Death's Door: A

When caught in a dilemma, he can act as if he's throwing his life away in order to escape.

Nobody can beat him when it comes to being quick on his feet during a crisis. However, Jason really hates this ability, since the only time inspiration reaches him is when he's placed in a dire, deadly situation.


Conquering the Sea with Friends: B++

Fills those who've sailed aboard the Argo with courage.

Encourages those who've not sailed aboard the Argo...somehow.

Let's just call it a pseudo-Charisma ability that's super limited.
5:
『Astrápste Argo』

Rank: B++

NP Type: Anti-Army

Range: 1 - 10

Maximum Targets: 50


The Radiant Ship that Tears the Heavens.

Aid received from the Argo, where the heroes aboard execute a coordinated attack.

The better standing Jason has, the greater both the crew's unity and the number of attacks made.

In contrast, if he is seen as a villain, the ship will suffer from the sabotage of being "surprisingly" empty, and the Noble Phantasm's strength will drastically decrease.

0:
Charlotte Corday was the woman who assassinated the prominent leader of the Jacobins, Jean-Paul Marat, during the French Revolution.

Her lovely appearance, paired with the fact that she planned and executed the assassination both efficiently and all on her own, earned her the nickname "the angel of assassination."
1:
Height/Weight: 166cm, 43kg

Origin: History

Region: France

Alignment: Neutral-Good

Gender: Female

Charlotte calls the mysterious creature (?) that is with her "Angel," but it's unclear whether it's really an angel or not.
2:
A girl who is energetic, precocious, and active, yet humble all at the same time.

Her hobby is reading, and if it weren't for certain factors, she would have spent the rest of her life in a monastery, never leaving her mark on history. However, the French Revolution causing the monastery to close changed her fate forever.
3:
The girl's motives for assassinating Jean-Paul Marat are complex. But if it had to be described in a single phrase, it would be "to save a hundred thousand lives."

In her eyes, Marat was someone who agitated the citizens and continued to cause bloodshed in the name of revolution and was the very cause of the nightmarish upheaval in France.


Normally, this reckless plan would never have worked. But with a bit of luck on her side and no small amount of contempt, she managed the assassination.


Later, investigators would attempt to determine whether or not she had anyone else working with her in the assassination plot. While there were those she deceived to obtain referrals, it was concluded that Charlotte Corday did indeed work alone.


She was ultimately executed by guillotine, and the executioner was none other than Charles-Henri Sanson. Sanson spent two hours with Corday, accompanying her from her cell to the execution site and later praised her in his memoir, saying she was valiant until the end, showing neither fear nor anger.
4:
Haphazard Planning: D+

While it was a completely reckless plan, luck was on her side.

Rises to rank B due to the Angel of Assassination.


Angel of Assassination: A

The name given to her by the people due to her lovely appearance and her bold plan.

Riding on her luck, lowers the guard of her enemies.


Iron Determination: D

A skill that comes from her firm resolve to carry through with the assassination, despite being far detached from the world of assassination or revolution.

Not as intense as Dantès's.
5:
『Le Rêve Ensoleillé』

Rank: C

NP Type: Anti-Personnel

Range: 1  Maximum Targets: 1


Love for My Country, Give Them a Dream They Can Drown In.

A silent and warm assassination by Charlotte Corday, who was dubbed the "Angel of Assassination".

Until the moment they are killed, the target feels no threat or indication of murderous intent. Unlike other assassination Noble Phantasms, evasion through Intuition or Mind's Eye is difficult.

The more times the target is aware of her appearance, her words, and her mannerisms, the assassination success rate goes up.

The bias that a lovely woman like her would never kill anyone intensifies.
6:
For her, her second life begins with disappointment and setbacks. Judging from the installed knowledge, her assassination did not change history, nor did it make the world right.


Therefore, she has just been summoned, and tends to despise herself with a bit of ridicule.


As you fight with the master, you will regain your original brightness.


She was summoned by Odysseus and unconsciously spies in the Greek Revelation, but was released by the eradication of Zeus Nanomachine.

She achieved assassination of Odysseus alone. She has a faint love for the master, and although she managed to hide it, she loses her memory of concealing it just before her disappearance.

Without color, the love disappeared with the sunset.

aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Cute Boy?-Type Servant

The Saber Astolfo you're always thirsting over is finally here, aren't you happy? He seems to be more excited than his usual self.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
かんごしサーヴァント
バーサーカーじゃなくなっても相変わらずおかしい看護師さん。サンタさんの姿で空から舞い降り、良い子にも悪い子にも分け隔てなく痛い注射を打ってくれる。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
护士从者
即便不再是Berserker也还是不太正常的护士小姐。
打扮成圣诞老人从天而降，会一视同仁地为好孩子和坏孩子注射很痛的针剂。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Nurse-Type Servant

Even though she's not a Berserker anymore, she's still a nurse with some screws loose. She will float down from the sky in the Santa costume and give painful shots to good kids and naughty kids alike.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
くまくまサーヴァント
くまのぬいぐるみから真のムキムキ筋肉マッチョの姿に戻ったオリオンだ。中身はほぼそのままだ。アルテミスは相変わらずダーリンをシメる気まんまんだ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
熊熊从者
从熊玩偶恢复成真正肌肉发达男的俄里翁。
本质还是老样子。
阿耳忒弥斯还是兴冲冲地想要绞杀亲爱的。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Big Bear-Type Servant

The Orion who went from a stuffed bear to a truly buff macho chad. Inside he's the same Orion as his stuffed bear self. Artemis still likes to wrap her arms VERY tightly around his neck.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
いんきゃサーヴァント
昔はちょっとイキって木刀を持ち歩いていたが今は自己評価が極端に低い後ろ向きな男の子。セリフよりモノローグが倍くらいある。他人との距離感に敏感なので懐くまで時間がかかる。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
阴暗从者
以前有点得意忘形地拿着木刀到处跑，现在对自己的评价极端低下的消极男孩。
内心独白比台词多一倍。
对与他人的距离感相当敏感，所以想搞好关系很花时间。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Pessimistic-Type Servant

He used to be a bit arrogant and carried around a wooden sword. Now, he's extremely pessimistic and way underestimate himself. He has more monologues than dialogues in the game. He's sensitive about his distance with others so it might take some time before he opens up to you.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
めがみサーヴァント
ゼウスの嫁さんのひとり。牛ロボと巨大人型ロボをしもべとしてあやつる。強力な包容力と甘やかし力を発揮してアメちゃんを配り回るおばあちゃんだ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
女神从者
宙斯妻子之一。将牛型机器人与巨大人型机器人作为仆从操控。
是发挥着强大包容力与纵容力到处分发糖果的老奶奶。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Goddess-Type Servant

One of Zeus's wives. She commands over a giant robot bull and a giant humanoid robot. She's extremely tolerant and she will spoil anyone by showering them with love. She's like a kind aunty who walks around giving people candy.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
プリンセスサーヴァント
みんな知ってる愛され系ふわふわ美少女。愛されすぎてつい国を傾けてしまう。フォーリナーなのでそこはかとなくエッチな雰囲気がある。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
公主从者
人尽皆知受人宠爱系轻飘飘美少女。
因过于受宠爱以至于不小心倾国了。
由于是Foreigner，总有种难以形容的色情感。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Princess-Type Servant

A beautiful and lovely girl who's adored by everyone. She's so adored that the people who adored her forgot how to run a country properly. Since she's a Foreigner-class Servant, she's got an erotic side to her.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
パリピサーヴァント
春は曙で有名な平安のエッセイスト。ネットで生配信とかしていそうだが中身はウェイウェイしていてグイグイくるので、ずっと一緒にいるとしんどい。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
跑趴从者
以春曙抄出名的平安随笔作家。
感觉像是个会搞网络直播的人，但内在则是个会轻佻地亲近人的存在，所以一直待在一起会很累人。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Party People-Type Servant

A famed poet during the Heian Period who's known for her Pillow Book. Sounds cool, but she's actually a party animal who's always hyper and you know she totally streams. Kind drains all the energy out of you just by being around her.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ぐんしサーヴァント
トロイの木馬を考えたおじさん。天然ジゴロな無自覚イケメンでどこに行ってもモテモテだが、嫁さん以外にはいっさいなびかないぞ。鉄壁の防御を誇るが、無防備な胸の谷間が弱点だ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
军师从者
想出特洛伊木马这个策略的大叔。
天生小白脸帅得毫无认知，无论去哪儿都很广受欢迎，但除夫人以外不会对任何人动心哦。
以铜墙铁壁的防御为傲，毫无防备的乳沟是弱点。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Strategist-Type Servant

The dude who came up with the idea of Trojan Horse. A natural-born chad who's popular with all the girls, but he doesn't care about anyone but his wife. He prides himself of impenetrable defense, except the exposed part around his chest.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ふたごサーヴァント
いつでも一緒の仲良し兄妹。人間にコンプレックスを抱いており、兄のほうなどは常に殺意立っているが、召喚してしまえばこっちのもの、デレるのも時間の問題なのだ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
双胞胎从者
形影不离的亲密兄妹。由于对人类怀着自卑心理，因此哥哥始终杀气腾腾的，可既然被召唤就由不得你了，想让他害羞也只是时间问题。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Twin-Type Servant

A brother-sister combo who's always with each other. They have this weird complex toward humans and the older brother is constantly hostile. However, once they're summoned, it's only a matter of time before they go from tsun to dere.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
らんぼうサーヴァント
初登場のときからやたらオラついて強キャラアピールしてきた怖い人。交渉不可能な鉄壁オーラをまとっていたが、おやつをあげたら話し合いに応じてくれるらしいぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
粗暴从者
初登场时蛮横傲慢，总是在凸显自己强大的可怕的人。
虽然散发着无法交涉的铜墙铁壁气场，但只要给她点心，好像就愿意回应哦。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Violent-Type Servant

A scary person who's acting all tough from the very beginning. This Servant gives off a strong "piss off" vibe but with a little treat, negotiation is possible.

aprilFoolAssets: https://fgo.wiki/images/8/8f/罗穆路斯·奎里努斯愚人节卡面_FGL_1.png
https://fgo.wiki/images/5/51/罗穆路斯·奎里努斯愚人节卡面_FGL_2.png

https://fgo.wiki/images/8/80/罗穆路斯·奎里努斯愚人节卡面_FGL_5.png

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
けんこくサーヴァント
ローマを建国した偉大なローマ的存在ロムルスが神のように讃えられるうちに神より偉大なローマとなったすがた。彼の前では敵も味方もすべてがローマになってしまう。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
建国从者
建立了罗马的伟大罗马存在罗穆路斯随着人们神一般的赞颂，不知不觉变成比神还要伟大的罗马的样子。
在他的面前，无论敌我都会变成罗马。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Founder-Type Servant

After praising the Rome who founded Rome as a god long enough, eventually the Rome will become a Rome that's even greater than gods. Everyone turns to Rome in front of them.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
うちゅうサーヴァント
未知との遭遇を求め、最後のフロンティアへたったひとりで旅立った好奇心旺盛な人工衛星。こんなかわいい子をひとりで送り出すなんてとてもできない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
宇宙从者
寻求与未知的遭遇，独自踏上前往最后开拓地之旅的好奇心强烈的人工卫星。
怎么忍心送这么可爱的孩子独自旅行啊。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Space-Type Servant

A curious man-made satellite that set off alone into the final frontier in search of the unknown. Whoever thought to send such a cute kid out on his own must be crazy.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
おにサーヴァント
人里離れた山奥に生息するという巨大未確認生物。古代の恐竜の生き残りではないかと言われている。なぜかお嫁さんの格好をしていたりと現代科学では計り知れない謎が多い。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
鬼从者
生活在远离人烟山林深处的巨大未知生物。
有人猜测她是古代恐龙的幸存者。
不知为何打扮成新娘的样子，身上隐藏着不少现代科学未解之谜。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Oni-Type Servant

A giant cryptid that lives deep in the mountains away from human civilization. Some say she may be the last of the dinosaurs. For some reason she's dressed up like a Japanese bride, only deepening the mystery. Modern science may never be able to explain her.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
やみのサーヴァント
別次元の未来からやって来た、ちょっぴり露出度の高いヒロイン。死神と呼ばれ恐れられる闇の狩人。内に宿る闇の力が制御できず溢れ出てしまうことがある。鎮まれ……！
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
黑暗从者
来自其他次元的未来，相当暴露的女主角。
被称作死神，为人们所恐惧的黑暗猎人。
隐藏在体内的黑暗力量有时会无法遏制地溢出。平息吧……！
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Darkness-Type Servant

A heroine who came from another dimension's future. She may also be showing more skin than is necessary. A dark huntress feared by all, nicknamed the Grim Reaper. The dark power that resides within her sometimes rears its ugly head. Stay calm...

aprilFoolAssets: https://fgo.wiki/images/5/5b/阿尔托莉雅·卡斯特愚人节卡面_FGL_1.png

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
アルトリアサーヴァント
アルトリア種と同類のはずなのだが何かが違う謎多きアルトリア。異世界から転生して来たのではないかと噂されている。他のアルトリアより屈託のないほっこりフェイスが特徴だ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
阿尔托莉雅从者
本应是阿尔托莉雅种的同类，但总有些不一样的谜团重重的阿尔托莉雅。
传言猜测她有可能是异世界转生而来的。
特征是比其他阿尔托莉雅更为无忧无虑而温和的表情。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Artoria-Type Servant

An enigmatic Artoria, who seems somehow different from the rest of the Artoria-Type Servants despite the fact that she is indeed supposed to be one of them. Rumor has it that she might be a reincarnation from a different world. Her carefree smile sets her apart from the other Artorias.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ぼさつサーヴァント
いつもより慎みのある水着をまとい渚の人魚と化したキアラ。幼女姿のレア種が目撃されたとの噂があるが、ひと夏の幻に過ぎないのかもしれない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
菩萨从者
身穿比平时更为含蓄的泳装，海边人鱼化的祈荒。
传说还有人见过幼女形象的稀有品种，但那或许只是夏日的幻象罢了。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Bodhisattva-Type Servant

Kiara has turned into a beachy mermaid, clothing herself in a far more (surprisingly) modest swimsuit than we'd have all expected. Some claim to have spotted a rare juvenile form as well, but it may just be a summer illusion.

mcLink: 伊莉雅丝菲尔·冯·爱因兹贝伦(Archer)

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
マジカルサーヴァント
世の小学生の例に漏れず夏休みでテンションが振り切れてしまった水着魔法少女。とはいえ周囲は変人だらけなのでツッコミ役の責務からは逃れられない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
魔法从者
与世间其他小学生一样，因暑假变得无比兴奋的泳装魔法少女。
但因为周围全是些怪人，因此无法逃离负责吐槽的职责。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Magical-Type Servant

As with any school-aged student, the swimsuit-wearing magical girl has gone a little overboard with excitement from summer vacation. Yet, since all the people around her are oddballs, she still can't escape her role as the straight-man of the group.

伊莉雅丝菲尔·冯·爱因兹贝伦(Archer)_model_2.png
伊莉雅丝菲尔·冯·爱因兹贝伦(Archer)_model_3.png

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
こまりますサーヴァント
長い交際を経てついにゴールインした訳ありカップル。披露宴では仲睦まじくケーキ入刀するが、初夜には血の惨劇が待っているぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
困扰从者
经历了漫长的交往终于修成正果但有些难言之隐的情侣。
在婚宴上还亲密地一起切蛋糕，但新婚之夜将会面对鲜血惨剧哦。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Troubled-Type Servant

After dating for a really, really, really long time, this rather unique couple has finally tied the knot. They may be all lovey-dovey when they cut their wedding cake, but a bloodbath awaits on their wedding night...

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
きゅうけつサーヴァント
彼氏のために張り切った水着をまとったが肝心の彼氏には披露できず苛立つ悲しき先輩。熱心なストーカーに毎夜生命を脅かされている。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
吸血从者
为男友干劲十足地穿上了泳装却无法让关键的男友看到从而烦躁悲伤的前辈。
每晚都会被热心的跟踪狂威胁生命。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Bloodsucker-Type Servant

An unlucky senpai who was initially super excited to wear a swimsuit and show off for her boyfriend, but said boyfriend was nowhere to be found, frustrating her... Meanwhile, a zealous stalker threatens her life every night.

aprilFoolAssets: https://fgo.wiki/images/3/34/阿比盖尔·威廉姆斯〔夏〕愚人节卡面_FGL_1.png

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
まじょサーヴァント
マスターと過ごす夏休みが楽しいアビーちゃん。最初はかなりいけない子だが霊基再臨するたび名状しやすい姿に変わっていくぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
魔女从者
十分享受与御主一起共度的暑假的阿比亲。
起初是个非常坏的孩子，但会随着灵基再临逐渐变成难以名状的形象哦。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Witch-Type Servant

Abby is really enjoying spending her summer vacation with Master. She may be a naughty girl in the beginning, but she'll transform into the Abby we all know as she goes through Ascension.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
みぼうじんサーヴァント
VRゴーグルで仮想世界に入りながら本当に切れるレーザーブレードを実際に振り回す危険人物。現実とゲームの境目はかくも曖昧なのだ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
寡妇从者
戴着VR眼镜进入虚拟世界，却挥舞着实际能切割东西的光剑的危险人物。
现实与游戏的界限相当模糊不清。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Widow-Type Servant

A dangerous woman who loses herself in the virtual world of her VR goggles while wielding real laser blades. The line between reality and video games has really blurred.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
うたよみサーヴァント
エログロナンセンス猟奇小説に影響されて怪しいコスプレをするようになった文学少女。ミステリかと思ったら巨大蜘蛛が大暴れするホラーだ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
吟诗从者
受色情怪诞荒谬猎奇小说影响，玩起奇怪Cosplay的文学少女。
本以为是悬疑侦探系，实际是巨大蜘蛛肆虐的恐怖系。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Poetry Composition-Type Servant

A literary girl cosplaying in questionable outfits after getting influenced by erotic-grotesque-nonsense-bizarre novels. You may have thought she was going for a mystery vibe, but with the appearance of a giant spider running amok, it turns out to be horror-themed.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
たくせんサーヴァント
日本人なら誰もが知ってる邪馬台国の女王様。どんな問題も御神託と拳で一発解決できる霊験あらたかなおねえさんだ。雨乞いが得意なので米がよく育つぞ。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
神谕从者
日本人尽皆知的邪马台国女王陛下。
无论什么问题都能靠神谕与拳头一下搞定的灵验大姐姐。
擅长求雨，所以很会种稻米哦。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Oracle-Type Servant

The queen of Yamataikoku, famous in Japan. She is a woman of great spiritual power who can solve any problem with an oracle and her fists. She's really good at making it rain, so rice grows well with her around.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
ひときりサーヴァント
新撰組では沖田や土方と並ぶ剣の使い手。いつも飄々としているが、ここぞというときにはシリアスで剃刀のごとき切れ者の素顔を見せる。これでモテないわけがない。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
人斩从者
在新选组中与冲田和土方齐名的剑术高手。
总是一副悠然自得的样子，但关键时候还是会严肃起来，露出剃刀般能人的真面目。
这样怎么可能不受欢迎嘛。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Murderer-Type Servant

A Shinsengumi swordmaster on par with Okita and Hijikata. He always acts flippant, but when the moment calls for it, he shows his serious, razor-sharp side. There's no way he wouldn't be popular.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
おとうとサーヴァント
信長のかわいい弟。姉上大好きな忠犬。実装を求めるマスターたちの妄執が渾然一体の魔力源となり現界を可能にした、という噂がまことしやかに語られているが真相は謎。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
弟弟从者
信长可爱的弟弟。最爱姐姐大人的忠犬。
希望他实装的各位御主的执着成了浑然一体的魔力源，使他得以现界的传闻说得煞有介事，但真相为谜。
aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Younger Brother-Type Servant

Nobunaga's cute younger brother. He worships his sister like a loyal puppy. Delusional Masters asking for his implementation were the source of the magical energy that made his manifestation possible... At least, that's the rumor, but the truth remains to be seen.

aprilFoolProfile.JP:
えかきサーヴァント
稀代の名画家でありひまわりの妖精でありクラゲの化身である設定盛りだくさんの美少女。ユーモアのセンスがある。自己評価が低めですぐ邪神化してしまいがちなので気を付けよう。
aprilFoolProfile.CN:
画家从者
既是稀世名画家，又是向日葵妖精，还是水母的化身，塞满了各种设定的美少女。

aprilFoolProfile.NA:
Tsuchinoko-Type Servant

Shuten-Douji's Mount Ibuki form. She starts out as a newly-born girl, but she gradually evolves into a delinquent mature woman through Ascension. Nobody knows what would happen if you raised both her and Shuten-Douji together. Don't try it.

0:
Ibuki-Douji.


Another name for Shuten-Douji, specific to the Ibuki Mountains in the Omi region. Ibuki-Douji, born in most unnatural circumstances—being a child of oni—grew up in the mountains, eventually gaining frightful supernatural powers.


It is said that she migrated to Mt. Ooe and became the great monster Shuten-Douji, who gorged herself on blood and plunder in the capital...
1:
Height/Weight:

First Ascension: 133cm (Overall 200cm), ???kg

Second and Third Ascension: 180cm (300cm during combat), ???kg

Origin: Shuten-Douji Emaki, Otogizoushi, etc.

Region: Japan

Alignment: Chaotic-Good

Gender: Female

She is another aspect of Shuten-Douji, the anti-hero, as well as a Divine Spirit.
2:
Her divine aspects are quite prominent, and she is very aware that she is part of nature. As such, she tends to act on her own primal urges. Accordingly, she has no intention of integrating or establishing relationships with the world of human culture and civilization. Though she may create the impression of a certain naivete, an ignorance of the pleasures of alcohol, a lack of experience with the finer luxuries of life, or even an innocence of the madness that so often takes people in the course of their lives, the moment she loses herself to her desires, she proves to be entirely unstoppable. So long as she is not provoked, she remains quite harmless, though she is at the same time far more dangerous than Shuten-Douji.


The moment she shows interest in something, she grows extremely attached. As long as the object of her affection continues to exist, she is prone to simply staring at it for extended periods. More often than not, when she so much as touches her obsession, she destroys it. At the very least, she brings such profound unhappiness to it as to end in the poor unfortunate's death. As her other aspect is an oni, she is especially drawn to other oni. Additionally, beings of the same types as her (children of divine dragons) tend to draw her keen interest as well.


　◆


The above purports to be a description of Ibuki-Douji's nature, but the version of her which has manifested in Chaldea has proven to be a bit...different.


She has been...completely beguiled by the modern world.
3:
Her divine nature makes it largely impossible for her to see the world in the same manner as humanity does, but she tends to present herself as a big sister of sorts, behaving as if she has perfectly acclimated to the modern world. She seems to have studied a great deal about what it means to be human. She may even try to tempt or provoke those around her, including Master. Sherlock Holmes believes she either studied modern society somewhere, or met a Heroic Spirit who had, like her, grown more acclimated to the modern world. He believes that she was then able to use Chaldea's unique summoning system to her advantage to somehow bring that information with her into this manifestation. The truth, however, remains a mystery.


The moment the True Name of her Noble Phantasm is revealed, however, she reverts immediately to her more divine aspect. Even so, she seems to tremendously enjoy her persona as a carefree "big sister snake."


　◆


As a side note, when she is in her juvenile form (her First Ascension), her manner of speech and behavior are a mixture of her "big sister snake" and more divine personas. Her warnings about being "dangerous when she molts" likely refer to this more divine part of her aspect.
4:
Core of the Serpent God: A

A compound skill that includes Divinity. It should be inconceivable for her to possess Divinity since her legend says she is part human...but since Ibuki-Douji is also the child of Yamata-no-Orochi, she retains this skill at a high rank. Should she be reduced to an oni, she loses this skill, and it is replaced by a lower-ranked Divinity.


Octo-Pulsing Billow: B

A skill that inherited the nature of the flood deity, one of the aspects of Yamata-no-Orochi. It represents Ibuki's unchanging physique which destroys all things with its raging aggression.


Fingertips of Defilement: A

The loss of purity, a lack of honor, and finally death. Anything Ibuki-Douji touches is rendered impure, and may not exist in the presence of gods or humans. This skill may be categorized as an offensive skill, but it also grants additional effects against the dead, Demonic Beasts, and fallen gods even in conversation.
5:
『Sword of Gods - Kusanagi-no-Tachi』

Rank: A+

NP Type: Anti-Army/Anti-Fortress

Range: 1 - 60

Maximum Targets: 500


Shinken - Kusanagi-no-Tachi.

According to the "Kojiki" and "Nihon-shoki," a man called Susanoo-no-Mikoto, who was exiled from Takamagahara, came to the nation of Izumo where he saved a woman named Kusanadahime from being sacrificed, and killed a giant monster in the process. That monster was the eight-headed, eight-tailed, red-eyed creature Yamata-no-Orochi...a gigantic serpent whose body spanned over eight valleys and eight peaks. It was Japan's largest rampaging dragon.


Susanoo-no-Mikoto managed to defeat this giant serpent and obtained a divine sword from its tail. The sword was called Kusanagi-no-Tachi, also known as Kusanagi-no-Tsurugi, Ame-no-Murakumo-no-Tsurugi, and Tsumugari-no-Tachi. It was later kept at Atsuta Jingu as one of the three sacred treasures of Japan.


Ibuki-Douji wields this divine sword that was inside her father, Yamata-no-Orochi, as her Noble Phantasm. Upon its True Name release, the sword becomes a weapon so terrifying that, a single swing of it cuts open eight valleys and peaks and creates eight great rivers. However, according to Ibuki-Douji, the Noble Phantasm only wields a tiny fraction of the divine sword's brilliance, and temporarily at that.
6:
Originally, Ibuki-douji wouldn't really give any special attention to the Master that summoned her.

It may be due to her viewpoint being too skewed; recognising humans as a whole and not as separate individuals.

If she became able to view them as individuals, her behavior towards them might slowly change.


If they were to grow interested in you, you must be vigilant first before rejoicing about that.

Her fingertip is "that" of a god so even poison-proof magecraft or anti-poison skills wouldn't protect you from her.


Still...

The Ibuki-douji that materialised in Chaldea behaves in an intimate way towards the Master.

Strictly speaking, she behaves in a friendly manner with everyone.

For her to recognise the Master as an individual, they probably need to build a relationship that would present a chance for such a thing to come to pass.

In that sense, as expected, one must see if the original Ibuki-douji's nature stems from her roots.


◇


It seems that she encountered Kintoki on Mount Ashigara in the past.

He met her while wandering Ashigara as a monstrous child that was neither the spawn of men or oni and suffered an overwhelming defeat at her hands in sumo.


After that, Ibuki-douji has disappeared.

By no means did that mean that she passed away; she lived on, having transformed into a different existence, a different aspect.

In other words, she changed into the great youkai, "Shuten-douji", in both mentality and shape.


By connecting each testimony together, it would appear that Ibuki-douji and Shuten-douji existed by alternating with each other at certain or uncertain intervals.

"It's my turn now"

"Next will be my turn"

in the above order──────
